title: I WANNA MAKE A NEW RULE THAT YOU CAN'T NERF CHAMPS OR CHANGE THEM AFTER YOU MAKE THEM.
body:
MAKE IT RIGHT THE 1ST TIME RIOT BECAUSE YOU RUINED MY FIORA. 

CHANGING CHAMPS IN THE MIDDLE THE 1ST E-SPORT IS MONSTROUS. 

YOU ARE MONSTERS NOT DEVELOPERS UNTIL YOU QUIT THAT.

IT'S NOT FUNNY TO PEOPLE WHO TAKE THE GAME MORE SERIOUS THAN YOU DO.

IT'S JUST A GAME RIGHT?

WELL IT'S ALSO THE 1ST E-SPORT. 

AND YOU ARE OUT OF LINE. 

I WANT FIORA TO BE RESET TO PRE-REWORK. 

YOU MADE A MISTAKE.

replies.body: You fucking Capitalist.
Why are they calling me names?  Please don't call names...  Words like "toxic" and "capitalist" are a violation of the summoners code!
what? I'm saying that because to capitalized you're whole post.
Aren't joke threads supposed to go in M&G?
So E-sports are a joke to you hmm?
No, you are.
https://i.imgur.com/f7FdEdG.jpg
oooooooOOOOOOOOOOOOOooooooooooooooooooooOOOOOOOoooo snap son
well the casters make joke of it, at it, with it so i personally could care less
yeah riot listen to this nobody that has 0 influence over anything{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I have zero influence?   I am currently general of the World ARMY and I was #1 in 2vs2,3v3 and 4vs4 in Starcraft 2 at the same time.  I am Atom.  The World's greatest gamer.  I could of clowned on any of your LCS players with the old Fiora not because she was overpowered but because I was just better than them. Riot banned me from ranked and crippled my champ.  I was famous for my level 1 pentakills and 40 and 0 scores. They don't like Fiora because I was so good at her. They played god with the 1st e-sport.  For this act Riot is not a mockery to the E-sport community?
This is some top tier delusion right here
Or is it?

"World's greatest gamer"
"Level 1 penta kills"
"40/0 scores "
"I was so good riot banned me from ranked because...."

Like shit dude, assuming you're not just a dedicated troll, you need help. Actual help.

Edit: oh yeah, wtf is the "World ARMY"
alright you lair there is no way your baby ass is any of that shit. you want to play this game at all? then you will have to suck it up and accept change. if you can't do that then get off this game.

> [{quoted}](name=zacktootall,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AKZytNJ8,comment-id=000000000005,timestamp=2016-09-22T20:00:11.009+0000)
>
> alright you lair there is no way your baby ass is any of that shit. you want to play this game at all? then you will have to suck it up and except change. if you can't do that then get off this game.

Can you Change the word Except to Accept. They sound the same but the meaning of the sentence is changed entirely lol.
oh no i need proper english in a chat about a video game oh no.......

> [{quoted}](name=zacktootall,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AKZytNJ8,comment-id=00000000000500000000,timestamp=2016-09-23T16:34:30.066+0000)
>
> oh no i need proper english in a chat about a video game oh no.......

lol misspelled words is one thing, but sometimes using the wrong word changes the meaning of the sentence. That's really the only time I will point it out, because I find it funny. Also thank you!
your not welcome there is absolutely no reason to doing so

> [{quoted}](name=zacktootall,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AKZytNJ8,comment-id=0000000000050000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-23T19:07:26.224+0000)
>

There is no reason in doing what?
you literally pulled a "what were we talking about" on the internet..... read moron

>
> you literally pulled a "what were we talking about" on the internet..... read moron

Ya I'm not going to do that. The reason I asked is because your sentence didn't make sense in response to my statement.
how in the hell does it not make sense?! its english and its about the thing we have been talking..... you know what nvm good day sir and i hope to never see you again.

> [{quoted}](name=zacktootall,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AKZytNJ8,comment-id=00000000000500000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-24T18:31:33.569+0000)
>
> how in the hell does it not make sense?! its english and its about the thing we have been talking..... you know what nvm good day sir and i hope to never see you again.

Cool see ya tomorrow! :D
happy.....?
Who? World army that sounds..... starcraft where the hell did that come from lol. Ooh level 1 penta must take skill lol
I want a formal apology from Riot and Fiora pre-rework.

I was famous for my level 1 pentakills and 40 and 0 scores. They don't like Fiora because I was so good at her. They played god with the 1st e-sport.  For this act Riot is not a mockery to the E-sport community?

sure you are. You should know i am god himself and i can smite you whenever i please by just willing it
Bronze 4. That explains the ez pentakill. You were playing against a bunch of people who still builds AD Ryze.
so are you planning on trying to explain yourself to us nah sayers or are you going to delete this thread and run like the lair you are
you a player vs. the people who make this games. ill give you one guess who would win. hint: its the group with the ban button.

..... Well then I'm going to be a person who is against the person, who is against the person who is the against the creators of the game. You are full of it! There is no such thing as a ban button.
#tyler1

naw baby they had to use a boards post to ban him. The button doesnt exist Kappa
:D
Eww "baby" i dont even play with u,  didnt they just use the boards to notify that hes banned ( i hadn't  played attention to him or heard of him during that fiasco)
